scenario1.Subject: A morbidly obese middle-aged man, approximately 400 lbs, wearing a visibly strained neon-pink spandex cycling unitard that is semi-transparent from stretching, wearing a tiny aerodynamic helmet perched on top of a massive round head, red flush cheeks, bulging eyes, determined expression, overflowing rolls of flesh.
scenario1.Action: Furiously pedaling a child's tiny plastic tricycle during a professional race, knees hitting his chin with every rotation, the plastic wheels are flattened into ovals under the weight, sparks flying from the pedals scraping the asphalt, mouth wide open screaming in effort.
scenario1.Scene: Tour de France mountain stage, winding asphalt road, surrounded by confused professional cyclists in blur motion, picturesque French Alps background, bright sunlight, lens flare.
scenario1.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, hyper-realistic, high contrast, YouTube thumbnail aesthetic.
scenario1.Technical(Negative Prompt): No hallucinations, no distortion of bicycle mechanics beyond the intended deformation.

scenario2.Subject: An incredibly large sumo-sized man, wearing a formal tuxedo that has burst open at the seams, buttons popping off, red bowtie, sweating profusely, slicked-back hair, panic-stricken facial expression with a double chin trembling.
scenario2.Action: Attempting a graceful pole vault jump, but the fiberglass pole has bent into a complete circle under his weight and is touching the ground, the man is stuck hovering just inches off the grass, gravity defying physics, face distorted by G-force.
scenario2.Scene: Olympic stadium track and field event, packed stadium crowd in the background with mouths open in shock, bright stadium floodlights, dynamic dust particles floating.
scenario2.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, 4k resolution, cinematic lighting, action shot.

scenario3.Subject: A massive, rotund woman with curly red hair, wearing a floral muumuu dress, oversized sunglasses, holding a tropical drink with a tiny umbrella, expression of oblivious relaxation.
scenario3.Action: Lying in a standard hammock strung between two palm trees, but the hammock is stretched all the way to the ground, creating a deep 'U' shape, her butt is firmly planted on the sand while the trees are bent inward at a 45-degree angle, about to snap.
scenario3.Scene: Tropical white sand beach, turquoise ocean water, coconuts falling from the bent trees due to the tension, crabs scuttling away in fear, golden hour sunset lighting.
scenario3.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, vibrant colors, wide angle lens.
scenario3.Technical(Negative Prompt): No hallucinations, no defying gravity incorrectly.

scenario4.Subject: An immensely heavy man, wearing a 'Security' t-shirt that is three sizes too small, tactical belt hidden under belly fat, holding a flashlight, sweating, looking terrified.
scenario4.Action: Trying to hide behind a very thin, singular bamboo stalk during a stealth mission, his body is visible on both sides of the stalk by several feet, sucking in his stomach in a futile attempt to be invisible, eyes darting side to side.
scenario4.Scene: Dark jungle environment, moonlight filtering through leaves, enemy soldiers in the background pointing and laughing, misty atmosphere, dramatic shadows.
scenario4.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, cinematic composition, comedic timing.

scenario5.Subject: A gigantic, spherical man, wearing swimming goggles and tight blue swim trunks, body glistening with water, excited expression, mouth open in a shout.
scenario5.Action: Stuck tightly inside a clear plastic water slide tube, cheeks and belly pressed flat against the transparent walls creating a funny distorted face, water is backing up behind him like a dam, a line of impatient kids visible further up the tube waiting.
scenario5.Scene: Colorful water park, bright blue sky, the tube is suspended high in the air, refraction of light through the water and plastic, water splashing over the edges of the tube behind him.
scenario5.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, GoPro perspective, vivid saturation.
scenario5.Technical(Negative Prompt): No hallucinations, no anatomical impossibilities besides the weight.
